name: Why you should care about polynomials

speakers.name: Arantxa Zapico
speakers.bio: Arantxa is a Cryptography Researcher at the Ethereum Foundation. She received her PhD from UPF Barcelona in 2022. Her work covers theoretical and practical aspects of succinct arguments, such as SNARKs, vector commitments and lookup tables, including the design of Caulk, Basilisk, and Baloo.
